snippet: The owners of Planet Hollywood are preparing to close the Times Square location in June to split the three-level space between a smaller Planet Hollywood and a Buca di Beppo.
abstract: The owners of Planet Hollywood are preparing to close the Times Square location in June to split the three-level space between a smaller Planet Hollywood and a Buca di Beppo.

headline.main: Planet Hollywood in Times Square to Cohabit With an Italian Restaurant
